mapper.select: SELECT #{registerDate} AS `count_date`, #{serverId} AS `server_id`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `game_player` WHERE `server_id` = #{serverId} AND `create_date` = DATE(#{registerDate})) AS num
SELECT #{registerDate} AS `count_date`, #{channel} AS `channel`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `game_player` WHERE `channel` = #{channel} AND `create_date` = DATE(#{registerDate})) AS num

SELECT #{serverId} AS serverId, #{days} AS days, DATE (#{registerDate}) AS registerDate, IFNULL(SUM (o.`pay_amount`), 0) AS totalAmount FROM `game_order` o LEFT JOIN `game_player` p ON o.`player_id` = p.`player_id` WHERE p.`server_id` = #{serverId} AND p.`create_date` = DATE (#{registerDate}) AND o.`create_date` <= DATE(DATE_ADD(#{registerDate}, INTERVAL #{days} - 1 DAY))

SELECT #{channel} AS channel, #{days} AS days, DATE (#{registerDate}) AS registerDate, IFNULL(SUM (o.`pay_amount`), 0) AS totalAmount FROM `game_order` o LEFT JOIN `game_player` p ON o.`player_id` = p.`player_id` WHERE p.`channel` = #{channel} AND p.`create_date` = DATE (#{registerDate}) AND o.`create_date` <= DATE(DATE_ADD(#{registerDate}, INTERVAL #{days} - 1 DAY))
